text:
Abhaaaaaaaaaaaa

I always blame the structure of CS for being the reason for keeping away such great members from me. Bhai kaafi zyaada log hai jinse acchi baat nahi hopaayi :(. Yaar sweet toh tum ho par phir bhi tum Goa nahi aaye toh I'll take your praises now.

Kaafi baatein karni hai tumse. Cheezei jo jaanni hai and persepectives jo explore karni hai about every other thing that life has to offer. Yaar. Par it's ok ig. It's not the end when there are things that remain :P. Ig we will meet sometime soon. Hamara bhi dheerese ek close-knit group banta hua dikh raha tbh XD. When we'll meet and have fun, ig all this will be worth it.

Until then, Abha! Tab tak you know ki mai tang karta rahunga messenger pe, just like every once in a while I've been doing now XD
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Thanks for all those memes and reels aajkal, they keep me sane. Thanks to Dipuk and Yashi we got to meet each other, saala kuch toh dhang ka kiya inhone apni zindagi mai.

Man you have been the most relatable person in the campus. Funny how Dipuk once aptly said that we are birds of the same feather (something in those lines, idk). Bhai tumse kaafi baatein kari lol. Talking to you somehow kept me sound. Continue to be the person that you are man, you really helped me, and I know that you will go onto help many.

Lol, I still can't get over those mama mio walks XD. Mast intoxication tha ye toh XD. Bhai aise hi mast aadmi raho tum, Russian gals ko patao, comrades banao, China ko nuke kardo(?). Thanks for giving me the space to be vulnerable, thanks for helping me come out of it.

With nothing but good memories, I wish we go onto make even more somehow. Take care bruh. You really gave me peace when I lacked it.
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text: Hey man. It was cool to talk to you always! Aise hi mast raho aur chaapte raho! All the best for your future!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Ali Fadaz Khan

Am sorry, I know you don't like this XD.

Bhai kahase shuru karu? The three-hour-long discussion (behas) that we had on that night? The unexpected encounter with that professor? The fraud-ing that we did in our summer projects? How benevolently you tried to teach me on that endsem, at the cost of your preparation? How we tried to eat up all the syllabus together a few days before they happened? How you tried to motivate me with all your might when you had much to deal with in your life too? How you helped me find a nuanced interest in philosophy with our discussions with clashing PoVs?

Man yes. All this is still a part of me. Still fresh and wondering how it has been so long since all of this happened. You were great to be with and to learn from. I wish we could have had more time (not that we had less time, but any discussion with you seems endless even now).

To a man of two hearts with four thoughts to each and a mind opposing every one of them. Take care bhai! Kabhi phirse milna (unexpectedly?) plox. I surely will miss you.
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Hey there CC-mate! Thanks for that, was my only hooman interaction back then XD

All the best for your bright future ahead!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Hey man! Heard your legends from many, and got to see how much fun you are in the last few days! Kaafi mast aadmi hai aap, aise hi mast rahiye!

P.S.: Thanks for carrying my trunk _/\_
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bruh

There still are things that I still couldn't thank you for and things for which I couldn't say that I'm sorry. A lot comes to my mind when I think about you. The person who, even though, had a chance to find a better company on a happening Antaragni night, yet stuck to my lazy, lonely ass, which did not do much to help you out in that post. The person who is way more passionate and ideas so revolutionary that they were sometimes ahead of time? The person who helped push the team forward? The person who truly had a mission and vision that he strived for? At times you inspired me to work a lot harder, man!

I wish we could have still been in touch to have talked with you when I was a bit more mature enough to do so. From the many bags of sorries to pick from, I'd like to apologize for that one time when I blatantly ignored a particular case that you brought up to me just because the higher-ups were dealing with it, and you had to take it up. You are a man of action. You truly are.

I hope you continue to tread the path of being an individual who truly cares about others and does things to help them.

Thanks for those apples :P
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Didiiiiii

Abb kya bolu mai. Jitna mai tumhe summers mai jaanta tha, usse epsilon zyaada jaanta hu XD. Always a blackbox XD. Whatever it is, you too know that I'll always love you and be there for you no matter what.

Aise hi mast raho, logonko darate raho, and hosake toh mil lo? I'll miss you but I also know that you are leaving with many memories, bonds, broken hearts, and bhaiyya log.

Chaapu toh tum ho. Mast bhi ho. Bas messenger mai reply bhi kardo XD
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bhai mast aadmi hai tu. Wish we could have had more opportunities to meet and talk :P

All the best for your future!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bruh.

Lol, I have this weird habit of picturing a person while writing a memoir, and yours is of the summers you wearing that yellow minions vaala tee with those jeans straps XD. Kitna bacchu lag rahi thi XD

Continue to be the cutie that you are. Inspire many of my friends to fall for you so that I could leak their names to you (jo bhi ye padh raha hai, I'm sorry). Continue to be as kind-hearted as you are, be the brave one you are, for this helps the shit that I am, lol. Thanks to all those shitty times lately, I got to know how much you cared for me and helped me rise above my situations. You gave me strength, all the while when you were going in shitty phases. It means a lot.

From knowing that you are a black box to understanding the pain that it hides with all the happiness that it derives from the walks of life, it has been an incredible journey. Am glad that Goa happened (thanks again :P). Am glad that Ajay was brave enough for the parties (thanks Dipuk for paise), lol. I got to know you better. You really are a wonderful person, don't let anyone else take this away from you. Continue being one!

Angel over and out

P.S.: Abhi toh aur bhi dard jhelne hai and unka rr bhi karna hai XD
P.P.S.: We are still on the same page on Best Man, right?
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
The first time I ever saw you was in MTH102A ka tutorial. Boi you were on fayah in every tutorial XD. The respect meter only increased when Ajay told me how much of an honest, sweet, and hardworking person you are. Wish Ajay had learned something from you in all those years XD.

Here's to you and the awesome future you have ahead!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bhai kaise? Matlab kaise?

Hawt. Smort. Keeyut. Sexay. Empathetic. Encouraging. Kind. Responsible. BKL kaise?

I envy you more than I love you, ugh. MKC. Aisa lagta hai bhagwaan saare acche qualities tumme daaldiya hai galti se.

Anyways, moving on. Why are you so kind and humble? ðŸ˜­

You deserve many things that this world can't even offer. We all are indebted to you just cause you exist, mkc. You are also indebted to me cause:
1. I console your fans.
2. you did not accept that coordie proposal.

Bhai, I wish we could have spent more time together (Ops still reigns supreme, though); I wish I could have learned many more things about you and from you, wish we had a tinge bit of more time so that I can admire the fact that I am there with a person like you. You really make this world a better place. You really do. I have seen you do it.

Continue to be like this and continue to inspire people like me. This world needs people like you.

Aur haan thank you for letting me know that I send inappropriate text; I will start sending them more :3

Chaapte raho bhai <3
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Yo Avaniiii!

Kya mast aadmi ho tum! Thanks for the awesome company that you were! Thanks for bearing with mine and Dipuk's PDA XD. Aise hi mast raho! All the best for your future!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bruh. I still remember being on a loop with you and saying, "Bhai tu dil see bahut mast aadmi hai". Could not have been more right! Kya mast aadmi hai tu. Wish there was no Ops Acads ka difference (Ops reigns supreme still). Like kaafi mast log see kam waqt mila :(.

Chaahe jo bhi ho bhai, as you said, you have been through a lot and I strongly believe you deserve all this and even more. Itna pata hai ki tum bahut aage jaaoge, baaki toh milna toh hai hi vapis hame, need to make up for the time we lost by not meeting in campus.

P.S.: Bhai bas ye bata uss dinn beach mai aisa kya soch liya tumne ki campus nahi gaye XD
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Senpai _/\_

Thanks for all the life lessons, kya hota hamara aapke bina? Bhai your wing was the epitome of fun in the last few days. Bas aise hi mast rehna tumlog! Aur yaar tum kaafi mast lagte ho mujhe. Thanks for checking up on me that one time, means a lot!

Here's to you and your mast times ahead! Hope we can meet sometime again (Ajay ko matt bulana please)
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text: A hero we need but don't deserve
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bruh. You were fun to hang out with! Still remember the only time you came by our college. Still remember the rupture on your forehead from a tap on your early days here XD.

Inkem kummese tarvata mari
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Just for the record, the dumbest question I have ever asked to anyone is when I asked Debmalya, "Tera CHM102A mai A aaya kya?" Like, c'mon dude wtf was I doing?

From the time of not knowing you much to knowing how confused you are. It has been great spending some of my time with one of the most intelligent people I have met. It gives me hope that I, too, am normal with all of my faults and inability to decide and stick to one thing.

Chaapu toh tum ho. Maggu bhi ho. Smort, keeyut, weeb, warm, and many other great qualities that keep you at a standard that many can't even dream of. Though I am glad that I got to know a tinge bit about you, I wish I could have learned more things about and from you. On a serious note, I hope this world benefits from your intellect and that you don't go on to be that evil scientist.

Until our worlds collide again, I hope you continue to grow in ways that I can't dream of.
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bruh. Kya mast aadmi hai tu. LMAO. I still remember how fun it was to just be around you during the orientation days. Speaker ko roast pe roast karke chodd diya XD. Only when Ajay told me more about you I got to know ki tum kitne hardworking bhi ho. Respect Meter: Stonks!

Bhai bahut aage jaaoge tum. And I believe you will have fun and laughs with many in the way towards excellence!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
First off, I read that "Or bhaiii!ðŸ¤˜ðŸ¤™" in your voice XD!! Matlab yaha bhi swag leke aayenge aap guruji XD?

BC pehli baat toh maine kara tha saara kaam ðŸ˜¡! Par bhai jo bhi tha sahi hi tha, tumse mulaqaat hogayi toh maaf kardeta hu tumhe aur phy ko.

Bhai abb mil tu. Bahut mast treat dedunga <3. Time toh zyaada nahi hopaya par maze toh bahut kare usi lab mai XD. And uske baad ke encounters bhi mazedaar rahe. I wish we could somehow have spent more time, though.

Thanks bhai for the memories and the fun time. Bhai shaadi mai bulaana vaise :'). Bhuul toh tum jaoge shaadi mai bulana :(

Yaar bas dua karta hu ki tum aur mast bante jaao aise hi and chaapte jaao. All the best bhai! Baat karte rehte hai!!!!!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Gawd _/\_

Mowa ela ra asalu entha thopu nuvvu? Anyway, you have always been someone I admired and asked for help a lot XD. Chaala munduku veltav and I hope you have fun along the way too! Thanks for all the help, I couldn't have survived EE without you, lol.

Inkem kummuthunnav ga mari anni!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text: Bruh. You dope.
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Ummmmmmm

It was great knowing you man! Somehow, you believed (still read as "overestimated") in me when I was undermining myself. Lol, remember EPFL's letter? Hahaha. Say hi to Akka!

The time we spent was great, and yeah, we should blame CS :P. Thank's for my first tour of IITK! And sorry for sharing the pics late XD. Thanks for always believing in me, and thanks for showing me the paths of academia initially when I had no one. All this might seem odd to you, but ig it is the Telugu code of conduct that prohibited me from showing gratitude to their homies, it has been due for a while now, lol.

Funny how TSS food helped us to stay in touch somehow, lol.

I believe you'll tread a great path from now man. I wish we could have had some more time without that implicit code of conduct, lol.

P.S.: Fluid trauma marchipolenu vro
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Hey man! You have been AWESOME. Every interaction was filled with energy that I somehow matched! I wish we could have corrected some things, averted a few, and I apologize for failing to do so. Man, you were great to hang out with, and thanks a lot for the picnic. That was DOPE!

I wish we could have had some more time to talk about the stuff we could not (The early auto ride back home? Rings a bell?). Here's to you and your bright and fun-filled future ahead! A man with an adventurous heart and energy to be ready for them! All the best, man!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Ok. Here we go.

When did we meet? How did we meet? Why did we meet? What was our first convo like? How did we turn out like this, lol? Why did we turn out like this XD? Damn. Everything has been hazy enough, just like our every other convo.

It's been a wonderful ride Dipuk. It really has been. And you, you only made it better with each passing day. Am glad that our worlds collided cause if they didn't, we wouldn't be the people we are today. Thanks for all the strength you tried to impart, increasing my morale, and making me understand that I am not weird for being a bit different. Thanks for all the lifelong philosophical trauma, lol. Thanks for bearing my philosophical trauma XD. Thanks for bearing with me and trying to understand me. And most all, thanks for being there.

BC do the destination one, not the mundane vaala _/\_. Bahut umeedein hai ðŸ˜¢.

Ig this won't be the end of it. With many things yet to happen, with many shits yet to rr for, with many highs to get high on, this indeed is not the end. And plox make that workcation happen.

Glad that Goa happened (Credits: Priyal). Glad that I saw Black Dog that night (Credits: Saggy). Glad that we cried. Glad that we felt light. Glad that the convo won't come true XD. And FU, you're the one lifting it (my spirit, just so we're clear). Also, how are we interchanging our roles? You are becoming me, and I am becoming you, lol (cringe, but ok). Why you make me cry, though? All the wholesome stuff you say makes me wanna cry ðŸ˜¢. I am grateful that I found you, man, and I love you a lot.

Kaash abbu maante. But you can be my car driver, and I'll be yours.

To the sad times.
To the FUN times.
To the dark times.
To the I-don't-know-what-to-do-so-I'll-just-be-there times.
To the waiting-to-meet-you-again times.
To us.
Thank you for existing, and thank you for doing more than just existing. Thank you for making this world a better place, and thank you for making me a better person.
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bruh

Thanks for being wholesome and accepting! I could confide in you during the early days when I had no one. You made my transition easier, man.

I still am in awe when you took me in with the same level of acceptance when we met again in the last few days <3. Thanks for being cheerful with such a bright personality!

Take care, man! To you... cheers!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Yo! Apologies for being a shitty lab partner, was not in a good state back then :P. In my defence, starting mai mast kaam kara that maine XD

All the best for your future! I hope you continue to have fun while climbing up the excellence ladder!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Weird that you worked (hard?) for 311 only to drop it. What's weirder is that I bothered you all through it only to drop it. Even weirder is Sagnik asking me to bother you for him dropping it in the end.

Thanks for all the help man. And thanks for those small talks, and a nod of recognition when we crossed our paths (literally). Stay as awesome as you are!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Yo man! It was a pleasure getting to interact with you! You were a great lead for the project btw XD. Still remember how you texted me asking this XD.

All the best for your bright future! Chaapte raho as usual!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Remember our first interaction? Lol. I thought of you back then as a dope kid (cause AM - Ha ye meri soch thi maa) with a calming persona (like damn, you sounded heavy and calm and soothing and smort and looked handsome and leagues of dopeness ahead).

Am glad I could have a small chat with you back then. Cause when I got to know further about you from Dipuk, I could only increase my respect meter for you. As for the memes, ig we both know why we put them <3.

You really are awesome man. When you continue being as hardworking as you are, also try to take care of yourself! You DESERVE all the great things that the world has to offer.

P.S.: You think we can meet sometime? So that I can say, "All the best for your future," just like everyone?
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Hey youuu! Same Pinch!!
ðŸ¥³ðŸ¥³

text:
Thank you for handling all my weird-panti in the last few days XD. Kaafi jhela tumne mujhe and Dipuk ko XD. Really sorry for eating up that foot-long :3

You really are quite the sweet person. Stay that way man! With many more things to surmount, I wish Jesus would shower his blessings on you. Amen.

I wish we could have spent a bit more time when sober though XD. Weird is we were taking in guava juice when we lacked drinks XD. Hoping for many such weird encounters! Let's meet again (plox) and relive such moments or make new ones.

Take care man. Stay the awesome one that you are!

text:
I wish Jesus was like you <3

(Ye visible matt karna XD)
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bhai kitna mast aadmi hai tu! Jesus aapka bhala karei. It was FUN knowing you man. Mishra ko maine abb tak ek kaam karte hue dekha aur woh tha tum dono ko bulana (mast kaam kara Mishra ji). I hope we could have had some more time for aur bakchodi XD. Ek aur trip, maybe?

I believe you will go onto become much more of a dope individual that you are, aise hi mast rehna!

P.S.: A word of caution. Almost no other Christian will be like me, tread your blasphemy with caution XD
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Why do I know what Yashi's cousin calls you? LOL!! Kya mast naam hai XD.

Anyway, thanks to her and Abhishek, we met. And boi, it has been wonderful knowing you! Kaafi masti kari hai hamne and I believe pending things are there for us to meet and do! Tum bhi kaafi cute hoooo!! Whenever I was with you and Abhishek, it only made me happy, and I lived in that moment. You two were too good to be true <3

Courses ka kya commonness badh gaya tha ham teenoka lol! And kya mast cheezei kari unme XD. Abb toh milte hi rehna hai, ye toh mai maanke chal raha. To what has been a wonderful journey, and meeting you two only made me better! I'll miss you more!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
The first time I ever heard about you was from Ritesh. Kya mast anonymity maintain karke bataya tha tumhare hardworking nature ke barei mai usne, only to reveal it later XD. Respect Meter: Stonks. And then TA mai bhi mast vella baitha karte the ham XD.

Bhai tum bahut aage jaaoge tum! And the even better thing is you are fun to be around with! Thanks for the bong tech :P. Here's to you and your bright future!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bhai, whenever I see you na, the only thing that strikes me is that smile. Chaahe jitna bhi fucked up situation na ho tumhara, woh smile mithte hue nahi dekha maine. Kaise karlete ho dost? Aisi smile jo kisiki bhi dukhi zindagi mai bhi temporary happy state laa de. Yeah, you helped me in my difficult situations just by being there nearby me and smiling throughout. Sochta hu tumhare baremai toh ek muskaan aati hai chehre pe.

Bhai sweet toh tum ho hi. Tumse woh coordie and placements vaali baat kar raha tha woh bhi yaad hai. Jab bhi tumse baat karta tha, hamesha I end up smiling at the end of our conversation. Aur tum itne chill se chaapte ho cheezei, bhai kaise karsakta hai aisa koi?

Yaar bahut si cheezei adhuri reh gayi. Ek toh saala ye ops acads ka bhed bhaav ne hame juda kara. Yaar bahut kuch baat karna hai tumse. Bahut kuch sunna hai tumhare barei mai, zindagi ke barei mai, tumhare perspectives of life and the moments of it. Bhai milna hai tumse. You were my implicit coping mechanism! God knows aur kitne logo keliye the.

Tum kaafi strong ho. Tu hai, teko pata nahi hai par tu hai. Ig you are one of those. those who make this world a better place just by existing in it. Continue to be that one man. This world doesn't deserve you, but it surely does need people like you.

Loads of love <3
Take care man. Milte toh rahenge hi ig.

P.S.: It took me ~3 minutes to write this, lol. Sab dil se aagaya BC.
P.P.S.: Mai aur dipuk tumhaari taang kheech rahe the XD
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
The last few days were fun, you were dope
Remove the seeds, cause imma smoke

Take care man! Somehow we are still in touch, wanna continue?
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text: Senpai _/\_
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bruh. MKL. BC. BSDK. I love you.

You know how much I have been missing you lately. Why don't you talk much, huh?

Anyways, god, I miss you. Ok, I am trying again. I love you ðŸ¥º

Ok again. From being a guy sitting in the middle of a class trying to understand shit that is being written on the board to being a guy up front trying to handle the shit that I am, thank you for everything. Thank you for all the memorable moments that we had. I still remember how vulnerable of a child you become when you open up; please do that often, cause that is you bitch! Duh. Thanks for all the sexy poses in Goa ðŸ˜›. Thanks for the baal, and thank you for being you, mere saath at least. Thanks for all the gym updates; I love them ðŸ˜‰. Thanks for the balls theory; I wish you could get your doctorate in it ðŸ˜­. Thanks for being that 90s ka Cali guy at heart; I love those vibes ðŸ˜˜.

BC sexess toh tu karega zindagi mai, no matter what you choose to do. Milke overthink karte hai jab anxious ho rahe ho toh. Aurd bsdk caffeine intake kam kar ðŸ˜’.

I would not have been the person I am without you. Thanks for scarring me for the rest of my life ðŸ˜›.

To the incomplete endings.
To the yet-to-be trips.
To your bong nature.
To you, just simply being you!
To all the times of confused oonga boonga.

Thank you, Sagnik. You made me a better person, and you bring a smile to my face just by being yourself. Whatever that lies ahead from now on, you will do great, and you too know that we all will be there for each other throughout.

PS: ML2 keliye maaf karna :P
PPS: You deserve all the love in the world and even more. So STFU.
PPPS: God I love you, ugh
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
A moment is all we are, eh?

BSDK sabko philosophical banna hai. A good line that has scarred me XD, thank you.

PS: I love you too much, ugh

text: Thanks to your understanding nature, I could have some peace from ML2. Thanks for handling Sagnik XD. Kaafi mast ho bro tum. All the best for your bright future!

Bro! Kaise itne smart yet considerate and humble ho? Kaise ho itne chaapu but still down to earth?

Man kaafi mast aadmi ho tum! And bahut aage jaaoge zindagi mai! Thankful that I could get to meet and spend some time with you!

text:
Bro. Bahut mast aadmi hai tu. "Tumne CHE se EE mai BC kara na?"

Bhai still remember our small talks and our rr on every course that gave us a headache. And Ketan sir ke projects ke barei mai ig ham dono ko accha khaasa idea lag chuka hai XD. Man you will do great from now, just continue to stay the awesome person that you are.

Take care bhai!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bhai chaapu ho. Mazedaar ho. Empathetic ho. Abb aur kya chahiye tumhe?

Thanks, man, for all those supporting times. Getting validated by you helped me a lot. And uss raat ki bakchodi mai bhi! You still were the same!

Here's to you and hoping that you become even more of a great individual you are!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
I still remember how you and I were the only ones who escaped the baap wing night. Yeah, I still fear you, lol. Bhai mast aadmi toh ho tum, and aur aage jaaoge.

Here's to you and your bright future!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju
Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Bhai after reading your memoir, laga ki kaafi ganda insaan hu mai! Reason keliye dekhiye agla episode of CID.

You really are a tear-jerker now, man. Anyway, thanks for always caring for me. I still remember how you helped me out even on your birthday and taught me some stuff right before the lab exam. Kuch yaad nahi tha BC par XD. You made my life easier! We had our own highs and lows, faults and pluses, and ig somehow, we made up for each other, meanwhile learning and inspiring from one another. Now I know that I have you to catch me if I ever fall. Kaafi different hai ham, but at the same time kaafi similar, ever felt that?

I've not been a great person to deal with later on, somehow you people managed to bear with XD. Thanks for that! Thanks for every gaali that you give aajkal, mera only source ho tum please don't stop XD.

Bhai woh kaha philosophical walks thi, bas Dipuk was overestimating me (as always) XD. Bhai you also owe for not spending much time in the last few days too, toh ha you better take up the workcation ki responsibility, also you're better at logistics so... XD. Bhai tumhare bina kaafi cheezei possible nahi hoti, and you are the person who was always there to clean the shitty scenarios that we created XD.

Bhai bahut baatei hai jo tumse karni hai, bahut cheezei jo bolni hai, bahut cheezei jo jaanni hai. Ig ye sab abb Bengaluru mai? Yaha thodi likhunga mai ye sab? :P Bhai zindagi mai toh accha karoge, aur woh mai paas se dekhung toh all the best kyu bolu? I'll just say that I miss you a lot and wish that we could still have had some more time (matlab itna time bhi sufficient nahi tha XD).

I love you <3

P.S.: Just for the record, you deserve all the love that this world has to offer.
P.P.S.: Remember what I told Dipuk tere barei mai? :P
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju

text:
Yooooo

It has been a long time since our first convo on that sofa. Damn how the things have evolved from thereon. From me being shy, introverted, and scared to being shy, introverted, and not so scared, you encouraged me to come out of my shell. Having our ups and downs made the journey even more unique and special. You somehow made me understand the importance of self-care and love. And that will continue to help me for a long time now!

Thanks for the awesome treats! I could only have a few, and yours can make up the major ones XD. At the same time, thanks for not turning me into the Women's Cell's custody XD. Thanks for bearing mine and Dipuk's nuisance XD. Thanks for that card; it was a tear-jerker. With many more turns of life awaiting you, I believe you will continue to become more of the person that you are at core - independent, strong, hardworking, and forward-thinking.

You mean a lot to many people and cherish the times they have had with you. Bas aise hi raho. You will undoubtedly make use of every apparatus available in your life tools to rise to heights that many can't. Chaapte raho dost! Your journey has just begun, and you will surely do great!
author: Digumarthi Komal Emmanuel Raju
